The following is a conceptual breakdown of frameworks, policies and initiatives that city developers need to navigate before implemeting projects on-the-ground. Navigating this maze (at different scales) is only part of the implementation challenges. 

:::{.panel-tabset}
## **Global and Multilateral**

### **World Health Organization (WHO) Initiatives**
- [**Healthy Cities Network**](https://www.who.int/initiatives/healthy-cities)  
- [**Urban Health Initiative (UHI)**](https://www.who.int/initiatives/urban-health-initiative)  
- [**Policy Briefs for Strategic Urban Health Approaches**](https://www.who.int/teams/social-determinants-of-health/urban-health/policy-briefs)

### **UN - Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs)**
- [**SDG 3: Good Health and Well-being**](https://sdgs.un.org/goals/goal3)  
- [**SDG 11: Sustainable Cities and Communities**](https://sdgs.un.org/goals/goal11)  
- [**SDG 13: Climate Action**](https://sdgs.un.org/goals/goal13)
